title: Assam Salmon
directions: Pound or blend the spice paste ingredients together until smooth. Heat up the oil in a large pot over a medium heat, and fry the spice paste until fragrant. This takes about 5 minutes.
Add all the sauce ingredients and bring to a boil. Turn the heat down, then add the lady’s finger, tomatoes, and salmon steaks and simmer for 10 minutes, until the fish is just cooked.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve.
